headline: Screening result: findings that may need follow-up.
explanations: Small round opacity may represent a nodule. Compare with prior films and consider CT if persistent.
Focal or diffuse opacity may be infection or fluid. Correlate with symptoms and temperature.

summary_en.impression: Interstitial/alveolar markings raise concern for pulmonary edema. (marked). Focal air-space consolidation is present. (marked).
consider: Assess volume status; consider diuresis per clinician.

safety_notice_en: This is decision support for health professionals, not a diagnosis.
safety_notice_np: यो स्वास्थ्यकर्मीको सहायक हो, अन्तिम निदान होइन।
warnings: Threshold file not found; using safe defaults.
